statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id = 2;
SELECT treatment, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY pet_id DESC;
SELECT id, treatment, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Infection%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id = 1 AND diagnosis = 'Fever'
SELECT id, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL
SELECT pet_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY pet_id ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT pet_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription = 'Antibiotics';
SELECT vet_name, vet_specialty FROM Veterinarians;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_name = 'Milo';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment != 'Surgery';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_name = 'Max' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT pet_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL AND treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT record_id, pet_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription LIKE '%pills%' AND diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT * FROM Veterinarians WHERE vet_specialty = 'Dentistry' ORDER BY vet_name ASC;
SELECT vet_name, vet_specialty FROM Veterinarians WHERE vet_specialty = 'Surgery' OR vet_specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date = '2022-07-10';
SELECT pet_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT prescription, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment LIKE '%antibiotic%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses JOIN Treatments ON Diagnoses.diagnosis_id = Treatments.diagnosis_id WHERE Treatments.dosage > '3 pills';
SELECT DISTINCT pet_id, diagnosis FROM Diagnoses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT pet_id, date, diagnosis, treatment, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(pet_id) AS total_records, MAX(date) AS latest_date FROM MedicalRecords
SELECT pet_id, MIN(date) AS first_date, MAX(date) AS last_date FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY pet_id
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM Diagnoses ORDER BY diagnosis
SELECT pet_id, SUM(CAST(dosage AS INT)) AS total_dosage FROM Treatments GROUP BY pet_id HAVING total_dosage > 100

SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE pet_id = 100;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT treatment_name, count(*) AS num_records FROM Treatments GROUP BY treatment_name ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT prescription_name FROM Prescriptions WHERE prescription_id = 5;

SELECT treatment, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment='Antibiotics';
SELECT pet_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY pet_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis='Cough' OR diagnosis='Cold';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Canine Flu' ORDER BY pet_id DESC;
SELECT pet_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment = 'Antibiotics' LIMIT 10;
SELECT prescription, pet_id FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%' ORDER BY pet_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment = 'Surgery' OR prescription = 'Painkillers';
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE prescription IS NOT NULL;
